document_data.mainbody:
aslo was a farmer from Liams Hold, just outside Daggerford circa 1372 DR.
Gaslo was noticeably more grim than his fellow farmers. He was an older human with deeply furrowed worried face.
In 1372 DR, farmer Gaslo traveled to Daggerford along with his fellows Rorry and Hevesar Dimpet to seek help with the mysterious disappearances of the cattle from Wild Pastures. The farmers stayed in the city during Daggerfords lockdown and eventually found help for Liams Hold. The group of adventurers, who later became heroes of Daggerford, agreed to investigate the bizarre disappearances.
